Class TeacherExamManageController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherExamManageController
public class TeacherExamManageController extends Object
Controller class for handling the exam management interface for teachers. This class is responsible for managing the UI interactions for exam management.

    • handleRefresh

      public void handleRefresh()
      Handles the refresh action. Reloads the exams and questions from the database.

    • handleDeleteFromExam

      public void handleDeleteFromExam()
      Handles the delete question from exam action. Deletes the selected question from the current exam.

    • handleAddToExam

      public void handleAddToExam()
      Handles the add question to exam action. Adds the selected question to the current exam.
